name: ConfOrg
tagline: Collaboration of conference organisers for conference organisers
body:
# ConfOrg

This is a repository created for conference organisers to build tools to assist organising a conference. A few nice examples are already existing online

- [JoindIn](https://github.com/joindin)
- [OpenCFP](https://github.com/chartjes/opencfp)

## Ideas

- Conference Speaker Travel Manager: A dashboard to keep track of speakers traveling

## Contributions

If you're organising conferences and you want to participate in this directly, send an email to [conforgs@googlegroups.com](mailto://conforgs@googlegroups.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
